column5: Any problems on Highway 17 West of Sault Ste. Marie? Heading up to Nakina on Friday, just want to make sure we're ok on time.

Phidelt157: Take a look at the Ontario Ministry of Transportation web site for road conditions at:http://www.roadinfo.mto.gov.on.ca/en...ion/index.html Click on Northern Ontario Index and then on that portion of the map you are interested in. You can then click on the "blue blobs" to get the details of the construction and its impact on travel.
